name: First Puzzle Shooter
description:
This game was made for Mini Jam 71 Theme: Puzzle
Limitation: Combine 2 Different Genres

We combined Puzzle and Action.

Controls:

W, A, S, D or Up, Down, Left, Right to move
Use mouse to aim
Mouse 1 or Left Ctrl to shoot

Credits:

Code and Game Design by Akusan
Code, Level Design, and Art by Manuel
Audio by R3
Some premade assets were used from Unity Asset store
